name: dinosaur games !
description:
'dinosaur games !' is an excellent game that has VERY tight controls. Play now for free and check how good are your reaction times!

You can play the Chrome offline game for free now!

This pixel art game is going to keep you entertained for hours!

duck duck go! and avoid all obstacles in the game!

We have also included a pretty good leaderboard that shows results on real time, so you can compete against your friends.
Did we mention that it is all for free?!?!

Play now and drop us a comment down below and let us know what you think!

'dinosaur games !' has been developed as an homage to the Google Chrome Easter Egg with no intention of of plagiarism or attribution of authorship. Images originally created by artist Sebastien Gabriel.
